item.title: ðŸŒ½ Compile and install the Linux kernel from source
item.description: Caution The content of this page has been entirely machine-translated into English, from Italiano. Therefore, it might contain any kind of errors. It's not often that new ideas come to mind, but when they do, they're always just the right amount of bizarre... Without digressing too much, it's precisely because of this development of things that years ago, for the first time, I found myself compiling the Linux kernel from source â€” on a Raspberry Pi 3 among other things, which in hindsight I wouldn't recommend â€” and now, precisely yesterday, again another time, after years (this time on the PC, luckily ), for a purpose that I won't spoil.
